Our awesome Features those we provided for you

1-year standard warranty
Temperature accuracy within +/- 0.5°C, +/- 0.9°F
On-screen message displays temperature reading alongside optional verbal message and LED traffic light system
Non-contact, fully automated kiosk reads user’s temperature in ~ 1 second
Email alerts for abnormal temperature readings, individuals not wearing a mask or questionnaire failures

People love us for
our quality products

The Zentron kiosks provide self-service temperature screening, eliminating the need for a full-time attendant to carry out checks with a handheld thermometer, saving you valuable staff resources and removing risk for employees. Screen all individuals on entry to offices, factories, manufacturing plants, hospitals, schools, hotels and more.
